node.title: Close contacts found hundreds of kilometres away in Yuendumu, as NT records two COVID cases
node.alt: NT Chief Minister Michael Gunner talks to the media. His expression is serious.
node.description: The cases were recorded in a health worker who was already considered a close contact and a Katherine woman who was not, bringing the cluster total now to 25.
node.content: ["The Northern Territory has recorded two\u00a0new COVID-19 cases overnight.", "The Katherine and Robinson River cluster now stands at 25 confirmed cases, after genomic testing yesterday linked it to four cases in the Darwin/Katherine outbreak earlier this month.", "The new cases are a 33-year-old\u00a0non-Indigenous male health worker\u00a0and a 59-year-old Aboriginal woman.\u00a0", "Chief Minister Michael Gunner said the man was already considered a close contact of the existing cases but the woman was not, with contact tracing for her movements now getting underway.", "The man is\u00a0fully vaccinated. However, he had\u00a0other existing health issues so he had\u00a0been transported to Royal Darwin Hospital for treatment, Mr Gunner said.\u00a0", "The woman\u2019s vaccination status is unknown.", "Wastewater results for all areas outside Katherine and Howard Springs came back negative overnight, including in Borroloola, Mr Gunner said.", "\"This is extremely good news,\"\u00a0he said.", "However, he said the Territory-wide mask mandate must remain while COVID-19 test results were still being processed.", "Authorities have detected a positive wastewater sample in the Binjari Aboriginal community on the outskirts of Katherine.", "Binjari, which is home to about 200 residents,\u00a0falls within the Katherine lockdown area.", "\"It's our intention to test every single person in the Binjari community today,\" Mr Gunner said.", "Three close contacts have been identified hundreds of kilometres away from the cluster in the remote central Australian community of Yuendumu, and one in Tennant Creek.", "Mr Gunner said 13 close contacts in Katherine were yet to be reached.", "He said although genomic sequencing had linked the initial outbreak triggered by a woman from Cairns with the current Katherine cluster, there were questions that remained unanswered.\u00a0", "\"In a sense, that just makes\u00a0this mystery even stranger because we still don't know how it went from that small first cluster to no cases for nine days,\" Mr Gunner said.", "\"There is a very real possibility that there are people in Katherine who have COVID and either don't know it or don't want to know.\"", "In those circumstances, he said, the best case scenario is \"we got lucky and it hasn't spread any further than what we've caught so far\".", "\"The only way to get to the bottom of this is by testing the hell out the Katherine community.\"", "Mr Gunner urged anyone \"with even the mildest symptoms\" to come forwards and get tested.", "He also said\u00a0anyone who has\u00a0visited an exposure site in the past few weeks should be tested,\u00a0even if they have already been tested recently.", "Mr Gunner\u00a0urged Katherine residents to get vaccinated as soon as possible, saying the town's rates were \"still not as high as they needed to be\".\u00a0", "\"There were only 98 new doses administered [at] health clinics yesterday,\" he said.\u00a0", "\"And half of those were first doses. It just isn't good enough.\"", "More to come."]
